title: Amazing Thai Jackfruit Farm Harvests | How Thailand Grows and Prepares Street Food

subtasks: Choose healthy and juicy seeds from previous harvest
Transplant seedlings into the fields with proper spacing
Carefully place each seedling in the ground using precise techniques

tasks.task: Weeding around the base of jackfruit trees
subtasks: Maintain cleanliness and good ventilation around the trees
Apply appropriate amount of water and nutrients

tasks.task: Listening for the perfect hollow sound to determine ripeness
subtasks: Tap the jackfruit rind to check for readiness
Make precise cuts at the stem with a sharp knife
Gently lower or catch the harvested jackfruits to prevent bruising
Load fruits onto carts for delivery to markets or processing facilities
Slice ripe jackfruits in a factory setting
Dry the sliced jackfruits with precision to preserve flavor and texture

tasks.task: Selling jackfruit products at street markets

Sell the snacks to locals and tourists
